SpeakerType.Description: The internal speaker of the device will be LVM_MONO or LVM_STEREO.

SpeakerTuning.Description: The output device may be headphones or speakers. Three standard speaker types are included for the Virtualizer, small, medium and large.

VirtualizerType.Description: The LVM_Mode_en enumerated type is used to select the virtualizer type to use

VirtualizerReverbLevel.Description: Controls the amount of reverb. The value 100 % provides the maximum possible reverb level.

CS_EffectLevel.Description: Controls the amount of 3D widening. The value 32767 provides full 3D effect and 0 provides no effect. Three levels are predefined, LVM_CS_EFFECT_LOW (16384), LVM_CS_EFFECT_MEDIUM (24576) and LVM_CS_EFFECT_HIGH (32767).

BE_EffectLevel.Description: Sets the amount of bass enhancement required in dB

BE_CenterFreq.Description: The LVM_BE_CentreFreq_en enumerated type is used to set the center frequency of the Bass Enhancement

BE_HPF.Description: The LVM_BE_CentreFreq_en enumerated type is used to set the center frequency of the Bass Enhancement.

EQNB_LPF_Mode.Description: The LVM_EQNB_FilterMode_en enumerated type is used to enable and disable the Low Pass filter in the equaliser

EQNB_LPF_CornerFreq.Description: Sets the 3dB corner frequency of the equaliser low pass filter

EQNB_HPF_Mode.Description: The LVM_EQNB_FilterMode_en enumerated type is used to enable and disable the High Pass filter in the equaliser

EQNB_HPF_CornerFreq.Description: Sets the 3dB corner frequency of the equaliser high pass filter

EQNB_Nbands.Description: Sets the number of active bands when the equaliser is enabled

BandDefinitions.Description: The LVM_EQNB_BandDef_t type is used for defining the band characteristics of the individual bands of the equaliser. The gain is in dBs, the frequency is in Hz and the Q factor is multiplied by 100, e.g. a Qfactor setting of 200 is equivalent to a Q of 2.00, the Gain Range is -15 to 15, the Frequency Range is 20 to 24000 and the Q factor range is 25 to 1200

PSA_PeakDecayRate.Description: The LVM_PSA_DecaySpeed_en enumerated type is used to select the Decay speed of spectral peaks for PSA

PSA_NumBands.Description: Sets the Number of spectral Bands to be calculated
